Human.name: Captain Samy
Human.attackMessage: It is definitely going to break

Human.name: Todd Howard
Human.attackMessage: Climbing was a mistake. So I will attack
Human.defendMessage: Great games are played, not made

Human.attackMessage: Ha, ha, ha... Ha, ha, ha! Ha! Ha!
Human.defendMessage: Shut up! You're supposed to be dead!

Windows96.name: Android Bill Gates
Windows96.attackMessage: Would you like a Windows update?
In my ideal nation, there would exist no one as weak as you!

Windows96.defendMessage: Can't you see how pathetic your attacks are!

WindowsVista.name: Cyborg Bill Gates
WindowsVista.attackMessage: Nice program, shame if it would crash...
Man enough to fight with me, but not man enough to defeat me!

WindowsVista.defendMessage: Hope you're listening. Level up homie

MacOS.name: Steve Apples
MacOS.attackMessage: That will cost you $900 before tax.
I haven't begun to use my full power.
Next time, I suggest you try fighting back.
MacOS.defendMessage: No matter how much you try, you still won't beat me

Ubuntu.name: Linus
Ubuntu.attackMessage: Command line attacks with random BS!
I can't kill you enough times...!
Ubuntu.defendMessage: Did you believe your pitiful powers could defeat me?
Weak! You're going to have to do better than that.
